item.title: CVE-2022-40203|2024-08-03T12:14:40.016Z -- algolplus -- advanced%20dynamic%20pricing%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in AlgolPlus Advanced Dynamic Pricing for WooCommerce.This issue affects Advanced Dynamic Pricing for WooCommerce: from n/a through 4.1.5.
